name: Breakout 3D (TheGamer)
description:
This is the first time I made a 3D game. This is a remake of Breakout by Atari in 1976. However, unlike the usual 2D game, this is a 3D game. I want to practice making a 3D game, so I believe this was the right moment. 

This whole game was developed purely by TheGamer.

Shaders obtained from godotshaders.com.
